Projections¶

Geodroid server utilizes the proj4j library for projection support.

Supported Coordinate Reference Systems¶

While the underlying proj4j library can handle many different coordinate reference systems (crs), Geodroid server limits to those that are represented by an epsg code. The entire list of supported coordinate reference systems is defined here.

A crs object is specified with the syntax is <authority>:<code>. Examples:

  • epsg:4326 - “canonical” geographic based on WGS 84
  • epsg:900913 - google/web mercator

About Boundless

Boundless provides commercial open source software for internet mapping and geospatial application development. We are dedicated to the growth and support of open source software.
